hello - I am lost!: anyone here know how I can set up my computer to route my other computer through it to the net... both are ubuntu, and I have them talking to each other... but the other one won't reach the net
anyone familiar enough with networking and using a computer as a router to answer that?
on the 'client' you need to set a default route that sends things to the 'router' PC (e.g. ip route add default dev eth0 via 192.16.0.1)
